title: Search for the great apes
brief_description: Narrated by Richard Kiley. Deep within the rainforest of Indonesia and Central Africa, two women scientists patiently study the habits of two species of apes - Birute Galdikas-Brindamour and her husband spend their time with the orang-outang in Borneo and Dian Fossey (the inspiration for the Hollywood film, “Gorillas in the mist”) studies the mountain gorilla of Rwanda.
